alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 11:35PM EDT until May 01 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River Lodi. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 PM EDT Sunday was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 6.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.5 feet on 08/19/1955. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Saddle River Lodi 5.5 6.1 Sun 11 pm ED 3.3 3.0 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued early Monday morning.
